definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Bromoc-resol Green and Phenolphthalein-Thymolphthalein were selected as indicators.
sentences.chinese: 选择溴甲酚绿和酚酞一百里酚酞为指示剂。

sentences.english: The conductivity of composites after secondary doping with m-cresol was higher than the original.
sentences.chinese: 用间甲酚进行二次掺杂后复合物的电导率有所提高。

sentences.english: Phenol and cresol isomers could be well separated in liquid crystal PBOB packed column.
sentences.chinese: 苯酚和甲酚异构体在液晶PBOB填充柱上分离良好。

sentences.english: The determination ofm - cresol content by brominating volumetric method was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了间甲酚含量的容量分析方法。

sentences.english: Brown liquid , mainly consist of phenol , cresol and xylenol etc.
sentences.chinese: 棕褐色液体，主要由苯酚，甲酚和二甲酚等组成。

sentences.chinese: 棕褐色液体，主要由苯酚，甲酚和二甲酚等组成。

sentences.english: Aim To determine total matrine concentration by exploring bromocresol green method.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用溴甲酚绿法测定苦参总碱。

sentences.english: This paper also discusses the relationship between the composition and properties of them cresol sulphonate - formaldehyde condensates MSF).
sentences.chinese: 讨论了间甲酚磺酸甲醛缩合物组成和性能关系。
